item.title: A4988 Stepper Motor Controllerx
item.description:
Goal: Learn about higher-powered digital electronics, and PCB design for integrated boards. This PCB was designed with my Atmega32U4 project in mind.

STATUS: I hit a wall :/

item.title: Photography

item.title: Li-ion Battery Charger
item.description:
Goal: Build my own 18650 Lithium-ion interface for later projects. Functionalities should include battery regulation, standard safety features, and a boost converter able to provide 5/12V. Learn about simple battery management systems.

STATUS: Back-Burner

item.title: Atmega32U4
item.description:
Goal: To create my own microcontroller devboard based on the Atmega32U4

To learn about embedded systems, designing PCB for digital circuitry, and programming/debugging the board.

STATUS: Work In Progress
